name: iIntelligenceTester4
description:
iIntelligenceTester4 by Simon Wilson
===================================

Confront another 9 brain teasing puzzles as you give your intellect some healthy exercise. Perfect for any age as clues are provided.

Use each clue at the top of each page to decide the answer/position to the current question, sequence or touch location. Try challenging friends if you feel they could do better!
